name: mikroe.click.smartdof
short_description: SmartDOF click features a highly advanced integrated system-in-package (SiP) solution with three different sensors on-chip: triaxial accelerometer, magnetometer, and triaxial gyroscope are all integrated on the same die, along with the powerful 32-bit ARM® Cortex®-M0+ MCU. Thanks to the integrated MCU, the BN080 SiP provides extensive signal processing.
